findings.title: A floating pragma is set
findings.description: The current pragma Solidity directive is "^0.7.0".

findings.title: Use of "tx.origin" as a part of authorization control.
findings.description: Using "tx.origin" as a security control can lead to authorization bypass vulnerabilities.

findings.title: Unused local variable 'data'
findings.description: The local variable 'data' is declared within the functions of contract 'GAMEOLOGYv2' but its value does not seem to be used anywhere in the functions.
